name: the-only-react-tooltip
description: Modern, simple, and accessible tooltip for React.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run minify
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run clean && webpack-dev-server --config example/webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.minify: uglifyjs --compress --mangle --source-map --output dist/index.js dist/index.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --source-map --output dist/package/helpers.js dist/package/helpers.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --source-map --output dist/package/Tooltip.style.js dist/package/Tooltip.style.js

author: Kos Grillis
